item.title: How do I TLS Ciphersuite?
item.description: “Should we use RC4 or AES-CBC ?” This is a legitimate question. Many have heard of the highly publicized attacks against AES-CBC (CRIME, BEAST etc) and lean towards RC4. If asked (granted no one asks me), my answer would be: If you can control web servers (not feasible in all situations) and users' browsers (almost impossible), upgrade to TLS 1.2 and go with AES-GCM. However, not many browsers supported these and to be honest, more users trumps loss of security in many cases.
